description:
[h1] Scrapfarer [/h1]

Get to the end and find the treasure! Most testers never got close, so if anyone legitimately finishes the game I commend you.

It's a whole new game, good luck :)

[hr][/hr]

Works in multiplayer as well, bit buggy though, put bugs on the [url=https://github.com/Woukie/Scrapfarer]GitHub[/url] .

[MODDERS] If you fork the mod, make sure to change the mod id. And add something cool don't just re-upload it.

[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-2LaVuvCj-I]Russian translation[/url]

[hr][/hr]

This is my last mod.
name: Scrapfarer
